```{r}
rm(list=ls())
```



```{r}
utility432 = read.csv('Utility432.csv')[,-c(1,2)]
demand432 = read.csv('Demand432.csv')[,-c(1)]
```


# Utility

## 1 to 6 
```{r}
basis_1_6 = c(1:6)
sequence1_1 = seq(from = 1, by = 8, length.out = 6)
sequence1_2 = seq(from = 2, by = 8, length.out = 6)
# sequence1_3 = seq(from = 3, by = 8, length.out = 6)
# sequence1_4 = seq(from = 4, by = 8, length.out = 6)
```

## 7 to 21 
```{r}
basis_7_21 = c(7:21)
sequence7_1 = seq(from = 1, by = 24, length.out = 15)
sequence7_2 = seq(from = 2, by = 24, length.out = 15)
sequence7_3 = seq(from = 3, by = 24, length.out = 15)
sequence7_4 = seq(from = 4, by = 24, length.out = 15)
sequence7_5 = seq(from = 5, by = 24, length.out = 15)
sequence7_6 = seq(from = 6, by = 24, length.out = 15)
```



# 22 to 24
```{r}
basis_22_24 = c(22:24)
sequence22_1 = seq(from = 1, by = 8, length.out = 3)
sequence22_2 = seq(from = 2, by = 8, length.out = 3)
```

```{r}
sequence_108_index = c(sequence1_1,sequence1_2,sequence7_1,sequence7_2,sequence7_3,sequence7_4,sequence7_5,sequence7_6, sequence22_1,sequence22_2)
```

```{r}
sequence_54_index = c(sequence1_1,sequence7_1,sequence7_2,sequence7_3, sequence22_1)
```

```{r}
utility108 = utility432[,sequence_108_index]
write.csv(utility108, "utility108.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
utility54 = utility432[,sequence_54_index]
write.csv(utility54, "utility54.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```


## 

```{r}
sequence_18_index = seq(from = 1, by = 3, length.out = 18)
utility18 = utility54[,sequence_18_index]
write.csv(utility18, "utility18.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```

```{r}
sequence_6_index = seq(from = 1, by = 3, length.out = 6)
utility6 = utility18[,sequence_6_index]
write.csv(utility6, "utility6.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```



```{r}
sequence_2_index = seq(from = 1, by = 3, length.out = 2)
utility2 = utility6[,sequence_2_index]
write.csv(utility2, "utility2.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```


# Demand



```{r}
demand108 = demand432[,sequence_108_index]
write.csv(demand108, "demand108.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
demand54 = demand432[,sequence_54_index]
write.csv(demand54, "demand54.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
sequence_18_index = seq(from = 1, by = 3, length.out = 18)
```

